lead_paragraph: Point guard Dajuan Wagner, who has been out of the N.B.A. for almost two years, signed with Golden State yesterday. Wagner, drafted sixth over all by the Cleveland Cavaliers in 2002, was found to have colitis during the 2004-5 season, and his colon was removed last October.
